		public System.Nullable<System.Boolean> Active { get; set; }

		/// backgroundImage css property
		/// </summary>

		public string BackgroundImage { get; set; }
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="billing")]
		public AddressDataDto Billing { get; set; }

		/// currency code
		/// Required
		/// Max length: 3
		/// Min length: 3
		/// </summary>
		[System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.Required()]
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="currency")]

		[System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.MaxLength(3)]
		public LinkCreateRequestCurrency Currency { get; set; }

		public string Description { get; set; }

		public string Email { get; set; }
		
		/// <summary>
		/// final redirect after a final payment
		/// </summary>
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="errorUrl")]
		public string ErrorUrl { get; set; }
		
		/// <summary>
		/// link expiration date, the link will only be executable until end of that day
		/// </summary>
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="expiration")]
		public System.Nullable<System.DateOnly> Expiration { get; set; }
		
		/// <summary>
		/// designates the type of transaction that will be created
		/// </summary>
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="intent")]
		public System.Nullable<LinkCreateRequestIntent> Intent { get; set; }

		public InvoiceInformationDto InvoiceInformation { get; set; }

		/// </summary>

		public string Logo { get; set; }

		/// identifier for the merchant
		/// Required

		public string[] PaymentMethods { get; set; }

		/// payment reference number, has to be unique per merchant and mode

		/// Pattern: [0-9a-zA-Z.\\-_/]{1,20}
		/// </summary>
		[System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.Required()]

		public AddressDataDto Shipping { get; set; }

		/// Required
		/// Minimum items: 1

		/// </summary>

		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="shoppingCart")]

		[System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.MaxLength(400)]
		public CartItemDto[] ShoppingCart { get; set; }
		
		/// <summary>
		/// final redirect after a successful payment
		/// </summary>
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="successUrl")]
		public string SuccessUrl { get; set; }
		
		/// <summary>
		/// identifier for the user

		/// </summary>
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="userId")]
		[System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.RegularExpressionAttribute(@"[0-9]+")]
		public string UserId { get; set; }
	}

	[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContract(Namespace="")]
	[JsonConverter(typeof(Newtonsoft.Json.Converters.StringEnumConverter))]
	[System.SerializableAttribute()]
	public enum LinkCreateRequestIntent
	{
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.EnumMemberAttribute(Value="authorization")]
		authorization = 0,
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.EnumMemberAttribute(Value="preauthorization")]
		preauthorization = 1,
	}
	
	[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContract(Namespace="")]
	[JsonConverter(typeof(Newtonsoft.Json.Converters.StringEnumConverter))]
	[System.SerializableAttribute()]
	public enum LinkCreateRequestLanguage
	{
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.EnumMemberAttribute(Value="de_DE")]
		de_DE = 0,
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.EnumMemberAttribute(Value="en_US")]
		en_US = 1,
	}
	
	[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContract(Namespace="")]
	[JsonConverter(typeof(Newtonsoft.Json.Converters.StringEnumConverter))]
	[System.SerializableAttribute()]
	public enum LinkCreateRequestMode
	{
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.EnumMemberAttribute(Value="live")]
		live = 0,
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.EnumMemberAttribute(Value="test")]
		test = 1,
	}
	
	[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContract(Namespace="")]
	[System.SerializableAttribute()]
	public class LinkResponse
	{
		
		/// <summary>
		/// identifier for the subaccount
		/// </summary>
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="accountId")]
		public string AccountId { get; set; }
		
		/// <summary>
		/// link activation status
		/// </summary>
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="active")]
		public System.Nullable<System.Boolean> Active { get; set; }
		
		/// <summary>
		/// total amount of all shopping cart items in lowest denomination
		/// Minimum: 1
		/// Maximum: 1999999999
		/// </summary>
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="amount")]
		[System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.Range(1, 1999999999)]
		public System.Nullable<System.Int64> Amount { get; set; }
		
		/// <summary>
		/// backgroundImage css property
		/// </summary>
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="backgroundImage")]
		public string BackgroundImage { get; set; }
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="billing")]
		public AddressDataDto Billing { get; set; }
		
		/// <summary>
		/// created time in ISO 8601 format
		/// </summary>
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="created")]
		public System.Nullable<System.Int64> Created { get; set; }
		
		/// <summary>
		/// currency code
		/// Max length: 3
		/// Min length: 3
		/// </summary>
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="currency")]
		[System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.MinLength(3)]
		[System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.MaxLength(3)]
		public LinkCreateRequestCurrency Currency { get; set; }
		
		/// <summary>
		/// free format description of the payment
		/// Max length: 255
		/// </summary>
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="description")]
		[System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.MaxLength(255)]
		public string Description { get; set; }
		
		/// <summary>
		/// customer email for invoices or payment notification
		/// Max length: 254
		/// Min length: 4
		/// </summary>
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="email")]
		[System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.MinLength(4)]
		[System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.MaxLength(254)]
		public string Email { get; set; }
		
		/// <summary>
		/// final redirect after a failed payment
		/// </summary>
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="errorUrl")]
		public string ErrorUrl { get; set; }
		
		/// <summary>
		/// link expiration date, the link will only be executable until end of that day
		/// </summary>
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="expiration")]
		public System.Nullable<System.DateOnly> Expiration { get; set; }
		
		/// <summary>
		/// hash for the client API
		/// </summary>
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="hash")]
		public string Hash { get; set; }
		
		/// <summary>
		/// link id
		/// Max length: 32
		/// Min length: 32
		/// </summary>
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="id")]
		[System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.MinLength(32)]
		[System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.MaxLength(32)]
		public string Id { get; set; }
		
		/// <summary>
		/// designates the type of transaction that will be created
		/// </summary>
		[System.ComponentModel.DefaultValue(LinkCreateRequestIntent.authorization)]
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="intent")]
		public LinkCreateRequestIntent Intent { get; set; } = LinkCreateRequestIntent.authorization;
		
		/// <summary>
		/// relevant information for the invoice module
		/// </summary>
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="invoiceInformation")]
		public InvoiceInformationDto InvoiceInformation { get; set; }
		
		/// <summary>
		/// link ISO language code
		/// </summary>
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="language")]
		public LinkCreateRequestLanguage Language { get; set; }
		
		/// <summary>
		/// customer payment link
		/// </summary>
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="link")]
		public string Link { get; set; }
		
		/// <summary>
		/// logo url
		/// </summary>
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="logo")]
		public string Logo { get; set; }
		
		/// <summary>
		/// identifier for the merchant
		/// </summary>
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="merchantId")]
		public string MerchantId { get; set; }
		
		/// <summary>
		/// execution mode
		/// </summary>
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="mode")]
		public LinkCreateRequestMode Mode { get; set; }
		
		/// <summary>
		/// last modified time in ISO 8601 format
		/// </summary>
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="modified")]
		public System.Nullable<System.Int64> Modified { get; set; }
		
		/// <summary>
		/// notify url. If unset no notification will be send
		/// </summary>
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="notifyUrl")]
		public string NotifyUrl { get; set; }
		
		/// <summary>
		/// available payment methods
		/// </summary>
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="paymentMethod")]
		public System.Nullable<LinkResponsePaymentMethod> PaymentMethod { get; set; }
		
		/// <summary>
		/// list of available payment methods
		/// </summary>
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="paymentMethods")]
		public string[] PaymentMethods { get; set; }
		
		/// <summary>
		/// identifier of the created payment process.
		/// </summary>
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="paymentProcess")]
		public string PaymentProcess { get; set; }
		
		/// <summary>
		/// identifier for the portal
		/// </summary>
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="portalId")]
		public string PortalId { get; set; }
		
		/// <summary>
		/// redirect url. empty if the payment process does not require a redirect.
		/// </summary>
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="redirectUrl")]
		public string RedirectUrl { get; set; }
		
		/// <summary>
		/// payment reference number, has to be unique per merchant and mode
		/// Max length: 20
		/// Min length: 1
		/// </summary>
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="reference")]
		[System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.MinLength(1)]
		[System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.MaxLength(20)]
		public string Reference { get; set; }
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="shipping")]
		public AddressDataDto Shipping { get; set; }
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="shoppingCart")]
		public CartItemDto[] ShoppingCart { get; set; }
		
		/// <summary>
		/// link status
		/// </summary>
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="status")]
		public System.Nullable<LinkResponseStatus> Status { get; set; }
		
		/// <summary>
		/// final redirect after a successful payment
		/// </summary>
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="successUrl")]
		public string SuccessUrl { get; set; }
		
		/// <summary>
		/// identifier of the created user.
		/// </summary>
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="userId")]
		public string UserId { get; set; }
	}
	
	[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContract(Namespace="")]
	[JsonConverter(typeof(Newtonsoft.Json.Converters.StringEnumConverter))]
	[System.SerializableAttribute()]
	public enum LinkResponsePaymentMethod
	{
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.EnumMemberAttribute(Value="visa")]
		visa = 0,
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.EnumMemberAttribute(Value="mastercard")]
		mastercard = 1,
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.EnumMemberAttribute(Value="amex")]
		amex = 2,
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.EnumMemberAttribute(Value="paypal")]
		paypal = 3,
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.EnumMemberAttribute(Value="sofort")]
		sofort = 4,
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.EnumMemberAttribute(Value="paydirekt")]
		paydirekt = 5,
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.EnumMemberAttribute(Value="postfinance-e")]
		postfinanceMinuse = 6,
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.EnumMemberAttribute(Value="postfinance-card")]
		postfinanceMinuscard = 7,
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.EnumMemberAttribute(Value="bancontact")]
		bancontact = 8,
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.EnumMemberAttribute(Value="przelewy24")]
		przelewy24 = 9,
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.EnumMemberAttribute(Value="alipay")]
		alipay = 10,
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.EnumMemberAttribute(Value="ideal")]
		ideal = 11,
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.EnumMemberAttribute(Value="eps")]
		eps = 12,
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.EnumMemberAttribute(Value="giropay")]
		giropay = 13,
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.EnumMemberAttribute(Value="sepa")]
		sepa = 14,
	}
	
	[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContract(Namespace="")]
	[JsonConverter(typeof(Newtonsoft.Json.Converters.StringEnumConverter))]
	[System.SerializableAttribute()]
	public enum LinkResponseStatus
	{
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.EnumMemberAttribute(Value="ready")]
		ready = 0,
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.EnumMemberAttribute(Value="created")]
		created = 1,
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.EnumMemberAttribute(Value="executed")]
		executed = 2,
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.EnumMemberAttribute(Value="expired")]
		expired = 3,
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.EnumMemberAttribute(Value="deactivated")]
		deactivated = 4,
	}
	
	[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContract(Namespace="")]
	[System.SerializableAttribute()]
	public class PageLinkResponse
	{
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="content")]
		public LinkResponse[] Content { get; set; }
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="empty")]
		public System.Nullable<System.Boolean> Empty { get; set; }
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="first")]
		public System.Nullable<System.Boolean> First { get; set; }
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="last")]
		public System.Nullable<System.Boolean> Last { get; set; }
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="number")]
		public System.Nullable<System.Int32> Number { get; set; }
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="numberOfElements")]
		public System.Nullable<System.Int32> NumberOfElements { get; set; }
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="pageable")]
		public Pageable Pageable { get; set; }
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="size")]
		public System.Nullable<System.Int32> Size { get; set; }
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="sort")]
		public Sort Sort { get; set; }
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="totalElements")]
		public System.Nullable<System.Int64> TotalElements { get; set; }
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="totalPages")]
		public System.Nullable<System.Int32> TotalPages { get; set; }
	}
	
	[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContract(Namespace="")]
	[System.SerializableAttribute()]
	public class Pageable
	{
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="offset")]
		public System.Nullable<System.Int64> Offset { get; set; }
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="pageNumber")]
		public System.Nullable<System.Int32> PageNumber { get; set; }
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="pageSize")]
		public System.Nullable<System.Int32> PageSize { get; set; }
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="paged")]
		public System.Nullable<System.Boolean> Paged { get; set; }
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="sort")]
		public Sort Sort { get; set; }
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="unpaged")]
		public System.Nullable<System.Boolean> Unpaged { get; set; }
	}
	
	[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContract(Namespace="")]
	[System.SerializableAttribute()]
	public class Sort
	{
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="empty")]
		public System.Nullable<System.Boolean> Empty { get; set; }
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="sorted")]
		public System.Nullable<System.Boolean> Sorted { get; set; }
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="unsorted")]
		public System.Nullable<System.Boolean> Unsorted { get; set; }
	}
	
	public partial class Misc
	{
		
		private System.Net.Http.HttpClient httpClient;
		
		private JsonSerializerSettings jsonSerializerSettings;
		
		public Misc(System.Net.Http.HttpClient httpClient, JsonSerializerSettings jsonSerializerSettings=null)
		{
			if (httpClient == null)
				throw new ArgumentNullException("Null HttpClient.", "httpClient");

			if (httpClient.BaseAddress == null)
				throw new ArgumentNullException("HttpClient has no BaseAddress", "httpClient");

			this.httpClient = httpClient;
			this.jsonSerializerSettings = jsonSerializerSettings;
		}
		
		/// <summary>
		/// List all payment links.
		/// GetPaymentLinks v1/payment-links
		/// </summary>
		/// <returns>default response</returns>
		public async Task<PageLinkResponse> GetPaymentLinksAsync(int page, int limit, string merchantId, string accountId, string portalId, string mode, Action<System.Net.Http.Headers.HttpRequestHeaders> handleHeaders = null)
		{
			var requestUri = "v1/payment-links?page="+page+"&limit="+limit+"&merchantId=" + (merchantId==null? "" : System.Uri.EscapeDataString(merchantId))+"&accountId=" + (accountId==null? "" : System.Uri.EscapeDataString(accountId))+"&portalId=" + (portalId==null? "" : System.Uri.EscapeDataString(portalId))+"&mode=" + (mode==null? "" : System.Uri.EscapeDataString(mode));
			using (var httpRequestMessage = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage(System.Net.Http.HttpMethod.Get, requestUri))
			{
			if (handleHeaders != null)
			{
				handleHeaders(httpRequestMessage.Headers);
			}

			var responseMessage = await httpClient.SendAsync(httpRequestMessage);
			try
			{
				responseMessage.EnsureSuccessStatusCodeEx();
				var responseMessageStream = await responseMessage.Content.ReadAsStreamAsync();
				using (JsonReader jsonReader = new JsonTextReader(new System.IO.StreamReader(responseMessageStream)))
				{
				var serializer = JsonSerializer.Create(jsonSerializerSettings);
				return serializer.Deserialize<PageLinkResponse>(jsonReader);
				}
			}
			finally
			{
				responseMessage.Dispose();
			}
			}
		}
		
		/// <summary>
		/// Create a payment link.
		/// CreatePaymentLink v1/payment-links
		/// </summary>
		/// <returns>default response</returns>
		public async Task<LinkResponse> CreatePaymentLinkAsync(LinkCreateRequest requestBody, Action<System.Net.Http.Headers.HttpRequestHeaders> handleHeaders = null)
		{
			var requestUri = "v1/payment-links";
			using (var httpRequestMessage = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage(System.Net.Http.HttpMethod.Post, requestUri))
			{
			using (var requestWriter = new System.IO.StringWriter())
			{
			var requestSerializer = JsonSerializer.Create(jsonSerializerSettings);
			requestSerializer.Serialize(requestWriter, requestBody);
			var content = new System.Net.Http.StringContent(requestWriter.ToString(), System.Text.Encoding.UTF8, "application/json");
			httpRequestMessage.Content = content;
			if (handleHeaders != null)
			{
				handleHeaders(httpRequestMessage.Headers);
			}

			var responseMessage = await httpClient.SendAsync(httpRequestMessage);
			try
			{
				responseMessage.EnsureSuccessStatusCodeEx();
				var responseMessageStream = await responseMessage.Content.ReadAsStreamAsync();
				using (JsonReader jsonReader = new JsonTextReader(new System.IO.StreamReader(responseMessageStream)))
				{
				var serializer = JsonSerializer.Create(jsonSerializerSettings);
				return serializer.Deserialize<LinkResponse>(jsonReader);
				}
			}
			finally
			{
				responseMessage.Dispose();
			}
			}
			}
		}
		
		/// <summary>
		/// Get payment link by id.
		/// GetPaymentLink v1/payment-links/{linkId}
		/// </summary>
		/// <returns>default response</returns>
		public async Task<LinkResponse> GetPaymentLinkAsync(string linkId, Action<System.Net.Http.Headers.HttpRequestHeaders> handleHeaders = null)
		{
			var requestUri = "v1/payment-links/"+ (linkId==null? "" : System.Uri.EscapeDataString(linkId));
			using (var httpRequestMessage = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage(System.Net.Http.HttpMethod.Get, requestUri))
			{
			if (handleHeaders != null)
			{
				handleHeaders(httpRequestMessage.Headers);
			}

			var responseMessage = await httpClient.SendAsync(httpRequestMessage);
			try
			{
				responseMessage.EnsureSuccessStatusCodeEx();
				var responseMessageStream = await responseMessage.Content.ReadAsStreamAsync();
				using (JsonReader jsonReader = new JsonTextReader(new System.IO.StreamReader(responseMessageStream)))
				{
				var serializer = JsonSerializer.Create(jsonSerializerSettings);
				return serializer.Deserialize<LinkResponse>(jsonReader);
				}
			}
			finally
			{
				responseMessage.Dispose();
			}
			}
		}
		
		/// <summary>
		/// Update a payment link.
		/// UpdatePaymentLink v1/payment-links/{linkId}
		/// </summary>
		/// <returns>default response</returns>
		public async Task<LinkResponse> UpdatePaymentLinkAsync(string linkId, LinkCreateRequest requestBody, Action<System.Net.Http.Headers.HttpRequestHeaders> handleHeaders = null)
		{
			var requestUri = "v1/payment-links/"+ (linkId==null? "" : System.Uri.EscapeDataString(linkId));
			using (var httpRequestMessage = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage(System.Net.Http.HttpMethod.Put, requestUri))
			{
			using (var requestWriter = new System.IO.StringWriter())
			{
			var requestSerializer = JsonSerializer.Create(jsonSerializerSettings);
			requestSerializer.Serialize(requestWriter, requestBody);
			var content = new System.Net.Http.StringContent(requestWriter.ToString(), System.Text.Encoding.UTF8, "application/json");
			httpRequestMessage.Content = content;
			if (handleHeaders != null)
			{
				handleHeaders(httpRequestMessage.Headers);
			}

			var responseMessage = await httpClient.SendAsync(httpRequestMessage);
			try
			{
				responseMessage.EnsureSuccessStatusCodeEx();
				var responseMessageStream = await responseMessage.Content.ReadAsStreamAsync();
				using (JsonReader jsonReader = new JsonTextReader(new System.IO.StreamReader(responseMessageStream)))
				{
				var serializer = JsonSerializer.Create(jsonSerializerSettings);
				return serializer.Deserialize<LinkResponse>(jsonReader);
				}
			}
			finally
			{
				responseMessage.Dispose();
			}
			}
			}
		}
	}
}

namespace Fonlow.Net.Http
{
	using System.Net.Http;

	public class WebApiRequestException : HttpRequestException
	{
		public System.Net.HttpStatusCode StatusCode { get; private set; }

		public string Response { get; private set; }

		public System.Net.Http.Headers.HttpResponseHeaders Headers { get; private set; }

		public System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeHeaderValue ContentType { get; private set; }

		public WebApiRequestException(string message, System.Net.HttpStatusCode statusCode, string response, System.Net.Http.Headers.HttpResponseHeaders headers, System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeHeaderValue contentType) : base(message)
		{
			StatusCode = statusCode;
			Response = response;
			Headers = headers;
			ContentType = contentType;
		}
	}

	public static class ResponseMessageExtensions
	{
		public static void EnsureSuccessStatusCodeEx(this HttpResponseMessage responseMessage)
		{
			if (!responseMessage.IsSuccessStatusCode)
			{
				var responseText = responseMessage.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().Result;
				var contentType = responseMessage.Content.Headers.ContentType;
				throw new WebApiRequestException(responseMessage.ReasonPhrase, responseMessage.StatusCode, responseText, responseMessage.Headers, contentType);
			}
		}
	}
}
